extension.name: ZLottie
extension.description: It allows to model a new lottie widget model.

events.name: AnimationEnd
events.description: Event called by widgets when their animation ends.

events.name: AnimationStart
events.description: Event called by widgets when their animation starts.

events.name: AnimationRepeat
events.description: Event called by widgets when their animation loops.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZLottie model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: GetCurrentFrame
methods.description: Returns the frame that is being displayed.

methods.name: GetFrameCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of frames.

methods.name: IsAnimating
methods.description: Returns if the animation is playing.

methods.name: SetCurrentFrame
methods.description: Changes the current frame of the animation.

methods.name: StartFrame
methods.description: Changes the start frame of the animation.

methods.name: EndFrame
methods.description: Changes the end frame of the animation.

methods.name: SetSpeed
methods.description:
Changes the speed of the animation.
**Info:**
>Normal speed is 1.0

properties.name: Source
properties.description:
Specifies the animation file name.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: AnimationSpeed
properties.description:
Specifies the speed of the animation.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LoopAnimation
properties.description:
Specifies whether the animation will play in an infinite loop.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: StartFrame
properties.description:
Specifies the start frame for the animation.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: EndFrame
properties.description:
Specifies the end frame for the animation.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Background
properties.description:
Specifies the background of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Elevation
properties.description:
Specifies the elevation of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>The widget displays a shadow according to its elevation.
>In order for the shadow to be displayed, the widget must have a non-transparent background.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description:
Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Padding
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description:
Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description:
Specifies the opacity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Range from 0.0 (0% visible) to 1.0 (100% visible)
